text: (yani) rasool jo tumhen Allah kay saaf saaf ehkaam parh ker sunata hai takay unn logon ko jo eman layen aur nek amal keren woh tareekiyon say roshni ki taraf ley aaye aur jo shaks Allah per eman laye aur nek amal keray Allah ussay aisi jannaton mein dakhil keray ga jiss kay neechay nehren jari hain jin mein yeh hamesha hamesha rahen gay. Be-shak Allah ney ussay behtareen rozi dey rakhi hai
